assets.title: Hello World Class with Say Hello Method

annotations.text: A simple "Hello World" Snippet that shows you how to use Pieces!

Creates a class that initializes a message and prints it when the say_hello method is called on an instance of the class. The code then creates an instance of the class and calls the say_hello method on it.
The code creates a class called HelloWorld with a message attribute and a method to print the message. It then creates an instance of the class and calls the method to print "Hello, World!".
